moves.1. e4: The most playable move all over the world. It is the best by test.
moves.1... e5: Black answers symmetrically to challenge white's centre.
moves.4. Bc4 b6: A mistake. Again best is : 4...exd4 (or) 4… Bg4 5. d5 Nd4 6. Be3 Nxf3+ 7. gxf3 Bd7 8. Nc3 Nf6 9. Rg1 Rg8 10. f4 exf4 11. Bxf4 Be7
moves.5. dxe5:
if 5...Nxe5 6.Nxe5 dxe5 7.Bxf7+ Ke7 8.Qxd8+ wins a pawn. (of course 7...Kxf7?? loses after 8.Qxd8.)
if 5...dxe5 6.Qxd8+ Nxd8 7.Nxe5. (or 6...Kxd8 7.Bxf7.)
moves.5... a6: 5...a6?? another mistake.  Best is : 5… Be6 6. Bb5 Bd7 7. Bg5 f6 8. exf6 Nxf6 9. O-O a6 10. Bc4 h6 11. Bxf6 Qxf6 12. Nc3 thought white has a clear advantage.
moves.6... Kxf7 7. Qd5+ Ke7:
Blunder 7… Ke7 8. Bg5+ Nf6 9. exf6+ gxf6 10. Qxc6 fxg5 11. Qxa8 Bg7 12. Nc3 g4 13. Nh4 Bxc3+ 14. bxc3 Kf7 15. Qd5+ Kg7 16. Qd4+ Qf6 17. O-O-O Qxd4
 Best was 7...Be6 8.Qxc6 .Ne7 9. Ng5+ Kg8 10. Qc3 Qd7 11. exd6 cxd6 12. Qd4 b5 13. Nxe6 Qxe6 14. Nc3 Nf5 15. Qd5
moves.8. Bg5+ Kd7: Another blunder 8...Kd7??? black should have played 8...Nf6 9.Qxc6 Bd7 10.Qc3 followed by 11.exf6 wins.
moves.14. Nc3 h6 15. Bd8 Nf6: Why forcing me to exchange queens while i am up with 9 points?
moves.16. Qxe6+ Kxe6 17. Bxc7 Be7: What can black do? I think RESIGN.
moves.18. O-O-O Ne8 19. Bxb6 Nf6: Why not? Black is losing anyway.
moves.27... Nc5 28. Rxh6 Kd7 29. b4: 29.b4! this move aims to remove the rook from b7 to place white rook on the 7th rank.
moves.29... Rxb4 30. Rd1+: Now black can't avoid being mated.
moves.30... Ke7: A blunder. best was Kc8 although game is over.Now it is mate in 7.
moves.31. Nf5+ Kf7: This makes mate faster.if 31...Ke8 32. Rh8+ Kf7 33. Rh7+ Kg6 34. Rg7+ Kf6 35. Nd5+ Ke5 36. f4+ Kxe4 37. Nd6#.
